items.title: Arctic Tern Expeditions
items.description: Arctic Tern Expeditions is redefining adventure with a unique approach to eco-tourism. Offering intimate journeys for 10-12 passengers on small expedition vessels, ATE navigates through Svalbard and other remote destinations. We elevated their brand, perfected marketing messaging, and boosted sales through thoughtful content strategyâ€”resulting in a fully booked summer 2024 travel season in the High Arctic.

items.title: Living River Campaign
items.description: For Braided River Books, the nonprofit advocacy arm of Mountaineers Books, we created the digital campaign for Dave Showalter's 'Living River: The Promise of the Mighty Colorado.' The campaign achieved 10M+ impressions across North America, and the book earned the National Outdoor Book Award for Nature and the Environment.

items.title: CMSF National Expansion
items.description: California Marine Sanctuary Foundation, a marine conservation foundation, sought our expertise to evolve from a local to a national thought leader. We provided a strategic overhaul, new brand architecture, messaging framework, and toolkit to help them scale proven conservation protocols internationally.

items.title: Converge Strategies
items.description: Converge Strategies, a facilitative consulting firm tackling wicked problems in national security and clean energy, needed to upgrade its thought leadership. We are mapping audiences, planning an industry-leading website redesign and signature content series, and elevating their brand and internal comms capacity.

items.title: Restore With Resilience
items.description: The Coral Resilience Lab at HIMB collaborates on groundbreaking coral reef restoration. Using best practices in science communication, evocative field photography, and infographics, we created a comprehensive guidebook detailing the scientific and community engagement aspects. The guidebook enabled enrollment of an additional Maui partner site.

items.title: Innovation Impact Videos
items.description: For The Nature Conservancy's Innovation Division in New York, we produced internal videos showcasing the impact of innovation methodologies on conservation outcomes. Through deep-dive interviews and engaging animations, we highlighted success stories and created an overview that integrated into the organization's onboarding process.

items.title: Ocean Youth Academy
items.description: Ocean Youth Academy offers digital curricula aligned with Next-Generation Science Standards. We upgraded their flagship course 'The Polar Oceans' with a studio re-shoot of all ten modules, redesigned animated graphics, and interactive digital activities for three grade levels, plus enhanced email and social media marketing.

items.title: ORBTL.AI Rebrand
items.description: For this geospatial startup, we delivered a complete rebranding including website design, social media launch, and science communication guides. The team received a crash course in science communication alongside their fresh new visual identity.

items.title: Yuba Trails Stewardship
items.description: Yuba Trails Stewardship aims to complete a fully connected pedestrian infrastructure for hikers and bikers across the Northern Sierras. Solarpunk Studio supported YTS in developing a comprehensive communications plan and a video-based crowdfunding campaign to launch the initiative.

items.title: Grid Enhancing Technologies
items.description: For the WATT Coalition advocating grid enhancing technologies, we provided social media management, website redesign, explainer videos, and brand development. The result: a 35% increase in LinkedIn engagement and more accessible communication of complex technical content.
